header.Title: Tashkent State Technical University named after Islam Karimov

Bo'limName: Department coordinating the work of providing accommodation to students
give-reason-for-ttj: Specify the reason for staying in the hostel
TTJxushKelibsiz: Welcome to the online application platform for students!
TTJeslatma: Note for students: Dear students, if you want to apply for a place in the student accommodation in the new academic year, please pay attention to the following:
eslatma1: -To leave an application on the site, you can enter only through your login and password in the HEMIS system;
eslatma2: Each student is allowed to submit an online application once, it is not possible to apply again;
eslatma3: -if you make a mistake while submitting an online application, you can contact the number +998944872284.
success-ttj: Congratulations, you have been accepted to TTJ. You can download the license below.
application-cancel: Your application has not been accepted!
application-removed: You are expelled from TTJ. You can find out the reason for the exclusion below
student-not-found: Such a student does not exist!
application-submitted-already: You have submitted an application before!

reasons.1: Orphaned (lost two or one parent) students
reasons.2: Students who have lost their breadwinner (father)
reasons.5: Children from families in dire need of social protection, included in the lists of "Temir Daftar", "Ayollar Daftari", "Yoshlar Daftari"
reasons.6: Children from a family in which two or more children study full-time on a contract basis
reasons.7: Foreign students who come from other countries
reasons.8: Students from remote areas of the republic
reasons.9: Students who actively participated in the work of the "Creative Youth Labor Squad" during the summer holidays
reasons.10: Members of the University Youth Council on the basis of a letter of recommendation from the Chairman of the Council of the University Youth Union
reasons.11: Talented student youth (winners of scientific Olympiads and sports competitions held at the international, republican, regional and university levels, as well as actively participating in spiritual, educational and sports events)
reasons.12: The chairman of the student council and the elders of the floors, who worked exemplarily in the student dormitory in the past academic years.
